name: Women's Lodge
description: At the Women’s Lodge treatment and recovery center, moms with children ages 0-5, and pregnant women, can stay together in the only drug and alcohol rehabilitation facility in the country, where this is possible. For three days a week, care for your child will be provided so that you can attend recovery and treatment services at our San Francisco location. The other four days include: recovery related activities, groups, classes, and healing sessions.

howToGetIt: Ready to begin to heal your spirit? Ready to start treatment? Call 415-865-0964 to schedule your intake. You are welcome to call and schedule your intake appointment regardless of your current sobriety status. But, it is important and required that you are sober during the actual intake appointment call.
cost: All applicants’ ability to pay for treatment will be evaluated at the time of the intake screening. The fee for service and payment options will be determined at this time.
